captions.text: The first time I came to La Poma it was maybe 8 years ago. The bikepark was built a few days ago.
Pablito, a friend of mine, called and told me that there were some new jumps in Premia, by the sea.
We went to check it and it became the first session there. We broke some bikes and crashed several times.
I will always remember that day, it was the first of many years riding here
They take really good care of the park. It's irrigated and well shaped. This is the way to ride different styles on a single day.
This is the best for learning how to ride the bike.
Freestyle is a sport that you practice on your own, but it is much more fun when you are with your friends.
The best of this place is that it has become a meeting place for friends. You can share your time with 10 or 20 more riders.
And what's the best part of it? You never ride alone.
Everyday you come here and it is a different ride.
It is like a theme park for bikes next to Barcelona, and it's perfect for riding and having fun.

title: Freestyle MTB group ride with Andreu Lacondeguy
